== Short ==

=== ~~Rev. 1~~ ===

~~A leJOS (Java) based application to control a LEGO Mindstorms NXT robot calculating a map of an area.~~

=== Rev. 2 ===

A SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) implementation using LEGO Mindstorms NXT and leJOS (Java).
